INSERT INTO PROFILE VALUES (#{fileNo}, #{userNo}, #{originalName}, #{fileName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND USERPW=#{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHATNO, USERID, MESSAGE, CHATDATE) VALUES (CHAT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{message}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
SELECT p.*, pr.* FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN DIBS d ON m.USERNO = d.USERNO
INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON d.PRONO = p.PRONO
INNER JOIN PRODUCTIMAGE pr ON p.PRONO = pr.PRONO
WHERE m.USERNO = #{userNo}
